divs: Sighting Detailsi was monitering my stores c.c.t.v system when i saw a small object moving veryfast it looked like an insect flying,i later replayed the video tape and slowedthe image down frame by frame and it clearly showed a rod long thin object witha flaping wing all around the object,it passed about 4 customers in the storebut no one seemed to notice it.it followed the same striate flight path twice and then was no longer seen.im passing the footage on to my line manager to try to get the footage madepublic.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around May 31st 2003
